description: A business partner certifcate describes a certification (eg ISO9001, IATF-16949) via a certifcate document  of a Catena-X business partner

urn_samm_io.catenax.shared.business_part.description: The provided regular expression ensures that the BPNL is composed of prefix 'BPNL', 10 digits and two uppercase letters.

urn_samm_org.eclipse.esmf.samm_character.description: Describes a Property which contains plain text. This is intended exclusively for human readable strings, not for identifiers, measurement values, etc.

urn_samm_io.catenax.business_partner_cer.description: Detailled entity of the certificate like IS09001:2015, IATF 16949:2015 or other, valid types are registered at BPN metadatacontroller

certificateType.description: type of the certificate as defined on the document,valid types are registered at BPN metadatacontroller

certificateVersion.description: Version of the certificate as defined on the document, usually the specific version of a certification standard

urn_samm_io.catenax.shared.business_part.description: The provided regular expression ensures that the BPNS is composed of prefix 'BPNS', 10 digits and two uppercase letters.

urn_samm_io.catenax.business_partner_cer.description: Optional enclosed sites where certificatation is valid including details about area of application

enclosedSiteBPN.description: The BPN of an enclosed site

areaOfApplication.description: Details on which areas / application types a certification is valid

urn_samm_io.catenax.business_partner_cer.description: Describes a property which contains the date in english format.
The possible trust level values of certificate
The BPN of the data service provider who validate the given certificate

validatorName.description: The optional name of the data service provider who validated the given certificate

validatorBPN.description: The BPN of the data service provider who validated the given certificate

businessPartnerNumber.description: The BPN of the certified legal entity

type.description: Type of the certificatation as defined on the document like IS09001, IATF 16949 or other

registrationNumber.description: Registration number of the certificate as in the certification document

areaOfApplication.description: Details on which areas / application types a certification is valid

enclosedSites.description: Optional enclosed sites of the legal entity which are enclosed by the certification

validFrom.description: certificate valid from as in the certification document.

validUntil.description: Certificate valid until as in the certification document. If certificate never expires value until expected to be 9999-12-31

issuer.description: The BPN of the issuing Authority e.g. TUEV Sued

trustLevel.description: The trust level of the given certificate none,low, high, trusted

validator.description: The BPN of the data service provider who validate the given certificate

uploader.description: The BPN of the business partner who originally provided the certifcate data or document e.g. Mercedes Benz AG

documentID.description: The id of the certificate document as stored by the data service provider for physical download via API
